DOC.criteria: eighteen ( 18 ) old ; use manual wheelchair least four ( 4 ) hour per day ; rehabilitation process ( include train manual wheelchair use ) ; enough ability develop skill include wheelchair skill train program ; willing take part study ; Frenchspeaking individual capable understand enough English language sign form carefully read competent give inform consent proxy power attorney ; verbal endorsement clinical therapist ( ) participate ; permission attend physician occupational therapist participate ; alert cooperative . unstable medical condition ( e.g . angina , seizure ) , indicate attend physician , hospital rehabilitation centre staff , enhance registered nurse selfreport ; emotional psychiatric problem type extent might make participation unpleasant , indicate attend physician , hospital rehabilitation centre staff , enhance registered nurse selfreport .
